commit.message:
Rollup merge of #106202 - estebank:trim-paths, r=Nilstrieb

Trim more paths in obligation types

@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@ LL |     foo::<for<'a> fn(&'a ()) -> (dyn std::fmt::Display + 'a), _>(None, (&()
